snippet.title: STALKER 2: The Importance of Chornobyl's Realism | gamescom 2023
snippet.description:
Find out more about the greatly anticipated sequel, STALKER 2: Heart of Chornobyl, with game director and CEO at GSC Game World Evgeniy Grygorovych. In this new Stalker 2 interview from gamescom 2023, Grygorovych details the challenges of developing during the war in Ukraine and how the team is doing. He also tells us more about STALKER 2’s development and highlights the importance of creating a realistic recreation of Chornobyl.

In STALKER 2, The Chornobyl Exclusion Zone has changed dramatically after the second massive explosion in 2006. Warring factions, hostile mutants, and deadly anomalies make it challenging to survive. However, STALKERS now enter and roam the zone at their own risk to retrieve valuable artifacts and search for the truth concealed at the Heart of Chornobyl.

STALKER 2: Heart of Chornobyl is coming to PC and Xbox Series X/S in December 2023.

#IGN
